incidents.title: Sending mail to @fcps.edu emails may not work
incidents.content: Sending mail to @fcps.edu emails may result in a "Your access to submit messages to this e-mail system has been restricted" message.

incidents.title: Director degraded performance
incidents.content: Director may be laggy or slow during this time. We are looking into the issue.

incidents.title: Temporary Cluster outage
incidents.content: Launching jobs using Slurm or using Jupyterhub may fail.

incidents.title: Database upgrades
incidents.content:
We are upgrading the databases on both Ion and Director. During this period, Ion will be inaccessible, and Director sites' Postgres databases will not be accessible.

2020-12-23T18:30:00.000Z
Maintenance concluded

Maintenance has concluded on both Ion and Director.

incidents.title: Storage Cluster Upgrades
incidents.content: An upgrade of our storage cluster will be performed over Winter Break. Some slowdowns or periods of interruption is expected.
